English: in, at, on (a place, time, language etc.)
Sense: into, towards | in::indicating language, script, or tone | in::during a period of time | in or very near a particular place | at::indicating time | at the date of
at which, on which, during which
Constraints: Merge:in da ('in' is used for both place and time)

Sense: at what time; at which time | when::during the time that | when::as soon as, at the time that | at the same instant that
Constraints: Compound:tem ke (similar to Globasa and Glosa)
